main event: A civilian observer sighted a bright object resembling a star, alternating between white and red, for about 15 seconds.
interesting points: The object was described as resembling a football with a rudder., The sighting lasted for approximately 15 seconds., The course of the object was noted as circular., This incident was documented in Project Blue Book., Conclusion states insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: bright star-like object, alternating between white and red
